casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Earl GOODE, Jr. No. 10A94-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 15, 2005. Diane Savage, for George Earl Goode, Jr. *216Barry S. NcNeill, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of December 2005 by Defendant to Hold in Abeyance the time in which to file the Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of December 2005."
